role.name: metarole-grouper-provided-group
role.description: A metarole for archetyped Grouper-provided groups

mapping.name: identifier
mapping.description: This mapping fills-in org identifier (e.g. 'member') from extension/grouperName (e.g. 'ref:affiliation:member'). It uses extension/grouperNamePrefix information from the archetype (e.g. 'ref:affiliation:' defined in affiliation archetype)

mapping.name: name
mapping.description: This mapping fills-in org name (e.g. 'affiliation_member') from identifier (e.g. 'member'). It uses extension/midPointNamePrefix information from the archetype (e.g. 'affiliation_' defined in affiliation archetype)

mapping.name: displayName
mapping.description: This mapping fills-in org displayName (e.g. 'Affiliation: member') from identifier (e.g. 'member'). It uses extension/midPointDisplayNamePrefix information from the archetype (e.g. 'Affiliation: ' defined in affiliation archetype)

mapping.name: lifecycle state
mapping.description: This mapping sets org lifecycle state to be either "active" or "retired", depending on whether Grouper group for this org still exists. Orgs in the latter state are on the way to deletion: their members are unassigned and after no members are there, the org is automatically deleted.
